Arvada.Daniels & Fisher Tower:
The Daniels & Fisher Tower is a distinctive historic landmark located at 1101 16th Street in Denver, Colorado.


== Description and history ==
Built as part of the Daniels & Fisher department store in 1910, it was the tallest between the Mississippi River and the state of California at the time of construction, at a height of 325 feet (99 m).
